name: Cherubeat
description:
Revelation 6:1-8 "...and the righteous Cherubeat's mixer awoke the four horsemen. And power was given unto them over the fourth part of the earth, to kill with sword, and with hunger, and with death, and with the beasts of the earth."

Grab your controller and challenge your reflexes to achieve the best score! Prevail against other players, comparing your score in the final leader board. 

This project is the result of a Game Jam located in Rome,  on July 2019
